name: mums at midnight
description:
Two 10" natural wood rods hold this vintage 1950's look clutch bag in a crisp and bold black chintz floral fabric accented with large fuchsia mums.

Closes securely with abalone buttons and tabs.

18" x 11.5"

Fully lined in a cotton/polyester pink blush sailcloth.

Makes for a lovely summer accessory for a retro day or night. 

To view more pictures of this sling, please go to my flickr page at:

http://www.flickr.com/photos/miabaggali/sets/72157617211390033

name: folding Japanese present bag in southwestern motif
description:
Folding Japanese present bag snaps closed and folds in like a wrapped present with two sets of snaps. 

Soft flannel in a southwestern motif with horses and geometrics. 

2” wide suede handles are decorated in a dotted Swiss pattern and hang 6”. Threaded through silver rivets, 4 suede strings hand 19” just for fun.

Fully lined in an lovely ecru lace.

Large 13" x 13". 

You MUST go to my flickr page to view more pictures of this bag:

http://www.flickr.com/photos/miabaggali/sets/72157619931066599/

name: boho hippie retro embroidered medallion denim sling
description:
A work of retro art in a bag...

Exquisite denim sling with intricate embroidered floral medallions up-cycled from a pair of vintage jeans. 

Meandering embroidery in a green, pink and white 70's roses retro motif. I've re-positioned the two butt pockets and placed one on the front and back. Handy for your cell phone and what-nots.

Two puckered cranberry floral ties close the bag. I fixed them in a men's tie knot, but a bow would look pretty as well.

Fully lined in a crisp cotton polyester rosebud print.

15" x 12"

Extra wide 4.5" sewn straps drop a very generous 20" which allows this bag to be worn across the torso, although if you purchase this bag, I can change the length to any measurement you like.

All around top edge stitching for decoration and strength.

To view more pictures of this sling, please go to my flickr page at:

http://www.flickr.com/photos/miabaggali/sets/72157607058939304

name: 1930's inspired tote in vivid paisley chintz
description:
Half circle 1930's tote in the most beautiful and detailed paisley in rich hues of rose, steel blue, cranberry, and heather green. Crisp chintz fabric.

6" circular bamboo handle attached with sewn tab. Closes with decorative vintage look button and two velcro squares.

12" x 9".

Fully lined in a light chocolate 100% linen.

Makes for a lovely accessory for a retro day or night.

name: layered tote on a flirty summer breeze
description:
Abundantly colorful, flirtatious and playful! Summer tote with bamboo handles in a breezy layered motif that has a movement all its own.

100% polyester fabric in a multitude of splashy and vibrant floral blooms on a sky blue background.

Lined in matching sky blue polyester.

Securely closes with an abalone button. Two bamboo handles with swivel metal hinges are attached with 1.5" wide ribbon in dusty rose.

26" width at the bottom x 14". 

Drop from top of handles is 9".
